recipe.title: Avocado Tomato Salsa
ingredients: 3/4 pound ripe tomatoes, rinsed and drained, stems removed
2 avocados, peeled, pit removed, cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 jalapeno chile, cored and seeded, or to taste
1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves, chopped coarsely
instructions: Cut the tomatoes in half and scoop out the seeds. Cut into 1/2-inch dice and put in a serving bowl.

Second Add the remaining ingredients and carefully stir to mix evenly. Taste for seasoning and adjust if necessary. Use as directed in the recipe or served with any type of grilled meat, seafood, or vegetable.
